page.pageName: Optimize ecommerce site performance and conversions

metaTags.metaDescription: Optimize your ecommerce website's performance and increase conversions. Speed up your site with Cloudflare's free ecommerce optimization services.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Ecommerce website optimization
relatedBlades.subtitle: Increase conversions with faster, more responsive online shopping experiences
relatedBlades.copy:
Your customers deserve lightning-fast, reliable, and secure shopping experiences. Increase online engagement and conversions with:

- __Personalized experiences__ featuring rich, quick-loading images and video optimized for any device
- __Optimized site performance for any device__, with peace-of-mind against downtime and reduced latency year-round
- __Protection against fraud, DDoS attacks, malicious bots__, and other events that threaten your ecommerce business

relatedBlades.quote: "Slow image download times frustrate online shoppers. For us, that can mean lost revenue. Cloudflare boosts our performance at least 23%, which keeps customers on our site."

quoteCarousel.quote: "Switching to Cloudflare, our system was 27% faster overnight. We improved our performance right off the bat — cache rates jumped immediately and things just started flowing."

"After implementing Cloudflare, our page load times in Los Angeles, one of our areas with the most customers, decreased by 94%. This improvement has led to an enhanced customer experience and greater customer loyalty."

relatedBlades.title: Optimize ecommerce site content
relatedBlades.copy:
- Accelerate dynamic ecommerce webpages with [ultra-fast CDN](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/products/cdn/)
- Store, resize, compress, and deliver images dynamically with [image optimization](https://www.cloudflare.com/developer-platform/cloudflare-images/)
- [Stream videos](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/cloudflare-stream/) that automatically adapt to your visitors' available bandwidth
- Deliver noticeably faster web assets and reduce latency with [smart routing](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/products/argo-smart-routing/)

relatedBlades.title: Optimize site performance
relatedBlades.copy:
- Avoid downtime and maintain site performance during traffic spikes, brute-force login attempts, and other abuse with a powerful web application firewall ([WAF](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/products/waf/)) 
- Protect against [DDoS attacks](https://www.cloudflare.com/ddos/) of any size and any kind
- [Stop bad bots](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/products/bot-management/) from stealing data, slowing down your site, harming your SEO, and other malicious activity
- Get the fastest response time, and advanced security against [DNS](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/products/dns/) attacks

relatedBlades.title: Optimize development
relatedBlades.copy:
- Significantly reduce your cost of [image hosting](https://www.cloudflare.com/developer-platform/cloudflare-images/), [caching](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/cache-reserve/), and serving on the edge
- Optimize for storage cost and performance across generative AI multimedia content 
- [Build](https://www.cloudflare.com/developer-platform/products/) stateful edge applications, such as chat rooms and shopping carts, at near limitless scale

imageAssetFile.altText: Optimize development — and transform the future of ecommerce experiences
imageAssetFile.title: Optimize development — and transform the future of ecommerce experiences

relatedBlades.title: Drive revenue and increase profitability with solutions that improve the security and performance of your ecommerce site.
relatedBlades.subtitle: Website and  Application Services

features.title: CDN
features.description: Ultra-fast static and dynamic content delivery decreases latency and increases performance by caching your content as close as possible to users.

features.title: Images
features.description: Cost-effectively build and maintain your image infrastructure in an end-to-end image solution.

features.title: Video streaming
features.description: Upload, store, encode and deliver [live](https://www.cloudflare.com/developer-platform/solutions/live-streaming/) and on-demand video to shoppers across native iOS and Android apps, as well as media streaming devices.

features.title: Bot management
features.description: Stop bad bots from stealing sensitive information, scraping pricing data, and causing other harm.

features.title: DNS
features.description: The fastest, most resilient, and secure authoritative DNS blocks and absorbs malicious traffic efficiently.

features.title: API security
features.description: Secure the APIs that power your ecommerce platform against attacks designed to perform unauthorized actions or steal data.

features.title: Stop browser vulnerabilities
features.description: Secure your visitors from supply chain browser attacks that can steal sensitive user data like credit card information.

features.title: Smart routing
features.description: Route web traffic of dynamic content across the most reliable network paths to avoid slow load times, disconnects, and degraded end-user experiences.

relatedBlades.title: C&A scales when online shopping soars
relatedBlades.copy:
Learn how Cloudflare [helped](https://www.cloudflare.com/case-studies/c-and-a/) a leading fashion retailer with more than 1,300 stores achieve:

- Up to sub- 100-millisecond response for online shopping pages increase conversion rates
- The ability to support 10x spikes in demand without service degradation
- A serverless approach that eliminates spending on capacity that sits idle except during peaks

planFeatures.name: Web Application Firewall (WAF)
planFeatures.description: Cloudflare Web Application Firewall's intuitive dashboard enables users to build powerful rules through easy clicks and also provides Terraform integration. Every request to the WAF is inspected against the rule engine and the threat intelligence curated from protecting millions of websites. Suspicious requests can be blocked, challenged or logged as per the needs of the user while legitimate requests are routed to the destination, agnostic of whether it lives on-premise or in the cloud.

planFeatures.name: Load Balancing
planFeatures.description:
Price includes a base fee plus usage fees. Usage fee is determined by the number of DNS requests made by visitors.

###### Base Fee
*Free, Pro, and Business Plan pricing:* - Up to 2 origin servers: $5 per month - Additional origins, up to 20: $5 per month per origin *Enterprise customers:* - Custom Pricing ---
###### Usage-based Fees
*Free, Pro, and Business Plan pricing:* - First 500k DNS requests are free - $0.50 per every 500k DNS requests after *Enterprise customers:* Can negotiate a reduced rate through custom pricing.

plan.description: For personal or hobby projects that aren't business-critical.

planFeatures.name: Stream
planFeatures.description:
Cloudflare Stream is an easy-to-use, affordable, on-demand video streaming platform.

##### Pricing
*Free, Pro, and Business Plan pricing:* - $1 per thousand minutes viewed per month - $5 per thousand minutes of video stored per month *Enterprise customers can negotiate a reduced rate through custom pricing.*
